mapper.insert: insert into MM_APPLICATION_EXECUTE_PARAM (PK_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL,APP_ID ) values (#{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update MM_APPLICATION_EXECUTE_PARAM set SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCRIPTION = #{describe,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IS_NEED = #{isNeed,jdbcType=CHAR}, DEFAULT_VAL = #{defaultVal,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_ID=#{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PK_ID = #{pkId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select PK_ID, SEQ, NAME, DESCRIPTION, IS_NEED, DEFAULT_VAL,APP_ID from MM_APPLICATION_EXECUTE_PARAM
